meanings.sent1: The garbage can was the whiffiest thing in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The skunk was the whiffiest animal in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The whiffiest socks in the room made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The whiffiest smell from the sewer filled the street.
meanings.sent5: The whiffiest stench from the old cheese was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Having the strongest smell among a group
meanings.sent1: Among all the flowers, the rose was the whiffiest.
meanings.sent2: The bakery had the whiffiest pastries in town.
meanings.sent3: The whiffiest perfume in the store attracted many customers.
meanings.sent4: The whiffiest aroma of coffee wafted through the cafe.
meanings.sent5: The whiffiest scent of fresh bread made everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: The most pungent or offensive odor
meanings.sent1: The whiffiest in the room came from the old cheese.
meanings.sent2: The skunk's spray was the whiffiest in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The whiffiest at the party was the result of burnt popcorn.
meanings.sent4: The whiffiest lingered in the air long after the garbage was taken out.
meanings.sent5: The whiffiest from the sewer made everyone cover their noses.
